item.title: AWK和SED常用命令
item.description: 使用awk过滤输出： 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 docker ps|awk 'NR!=1 {print $1}' # 作用：过滤docker ps输出的结果，只显示第一列Container ID的值，且不显示第一行”Container ID“ # NR!=1表示过滤掉第一行，NR==1表示只匹配第一行。END表示最后一行 # awk默认以空格为分隔符对每一行进行切

item.title: 安装配置Prometheus + Grafana运维监控平台
item.description: 一、安装配置Prometheus 1、下载Prometheus和node_exporter安装包并解压 wget https://github.com/prometheus/prometheus/releases/download/v2.8.1/prometheus-2.8.1.linux-amd64.tar.gz tar -xvzf prometheus-2.8.1.linux-amd64.tar.gz wget https://github.com/prometheus/node_exporter/releases/download/v0.17.0/node_exporter-0.17.0.linux-amd64.tar.gz tar -zxvf node_exporter-0.17.0.linux-amd64.tar.gz 2、修改prometheus.yml文件 scrape_configs: # The job name is added as a label `job=<job_name>` to any timeseries scraped from this config. - job_name: 'prometheus' # metrics_path defaults to '/metrics' # scheme defaults to 'http'. static_configs: - targets: ['192.168.1.135:9090'] - job_name: node_exporter static_configs: - targets: ['192.168.1.135:9100'] prometheus默认运行在909
